trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hampton
There were no other sightings in Hampton on or around August 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailswas at the state beach next to hampton harbor facing out towards the water. while observing an almost perfect display of wave\billow clouds, looking up around 40 degrees, noticed a wingless craft right at cloud level. craft was cylinder shaped and left no contrail. flying from north to south. craft was moving on a steady path. there was a very reflective flash and the craft suddenly appeared metallic and very shiny. it immediately changed direction, quickly ascended into the cloud, never to exit. since the clouds were in a wave like pattern, i would have surely seen it exit the cloud if it continued on it path from n to s. i have close to 20\10 vision and had zero problem observing this event. prior to viewing craft, a completely black airplane was seen making a wide circle, high over the coastal area. i even commented to my daughter on how it didnt look like the other planes. definitely not commercial.
Summary: Witnessed cylinder shaped, wingless object above NH coast. Very reflective.
